author: Motley Fool
title: Amazon (AMZN): Strong Industry, Solid Earnings Estimate Revisions
text:
Zacks Amazon (AMZN): Strong Industry, Solid Earnings Estimate Revisions Read full article Zacks Equity Research January 5, 2024 at 3:36 PM Â· 2 min read
One stock that might be an intriguing choice for investors right now is Amazon.com, Inc. AMZN. This is because this security in the Internet - Commerce space is seeing solid earnings estimate revision activity, and is in great company from a Zacks Industry Rank perspective.
This is important because, often times, a rising tide will lift all boats in an industry, as there can be broad trends taking place in a segment that are boosting securities across the board. This is arguably taking place in the Internet - Commerce space as it currently has a Zacks Industry Rank of 82 out of more than 250 industries, suggesting it is well-positioned from this perspective, especially when compared to other segments out there.
Meanwhile, Amazon is actually looking pretty good on its own too. The firm has seen solid earnings estimate revision activity over the past month, suggesting analysts are becoming a bit more bullish on the firmâ€™s prospects in both the short and long term.
Amazon.com, Inc. Price and Consensus Amazon.com, Inc. Price and Consensus Amazon.com, Inc. price-consensus-chart | Amazon.com, Inc. Quote
In fact, over the past month, current quarter estimates have risen from 78 cents per share to 79 cents per share, while current year estimates have risen from $2.67 per share to $2.69 per share. This has helped AMZN to earn a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), further underscoring the companyâ€™s solid position. You can see the complete list of todayâ€™s Zacks #1 Rank (Strong Buy) stocks here.
So, if you are looking for a decent pick in a strong industry, consider Amazon. Not only is its industry currently in the top third, but it is seeing solid estimate revisions as of late, suggesting it could be a very interesting choice for investors seeking a name in this great industry segment.

author: Fxstreet
title: India Gold price today: Gold falls, according to FXStreet data
text:
Gold prices fell in India on Thursday, according to data compiled by FXStreet.
The price for Gold stood at 9,221.16 Indian Rupees (INR) per gram, down compared with the INR 9,237.28 it cost on Wednesday.
The price for Gold decreased to INR 107,553.80 per tola from INR 107,743.10 per tola a day earlier.
Unit measure | Gold Price in INR |
---|---|
1 Gram | 9,221.16 |
10 Grams | 92,211.62 |
Tola | 107,553.80 |
Troy Ounce | 286,807.10 |
Gold price continued to trade sideways, capped by the $3,300-$3,380 range on Wednesday. Bullionâ€™s spike happened on reports of Powellâ€™s firing. Bloomberg revealed that â€œA White House official, speaking on the condition of anonymity earlier Wednesday, said they expected Trump to move soon against the Fed chief. That was also the impression of some lawmakers following a Tuesday evening meeting, where Trump polled them on the possibility of moving against Powell.â€
When asked on Wednesday, Trump said that while â€œitâ€™s highly unlikely,â€ he could still see removing the Fed chair for â€œfraud.â€
The US Produce Price Index (PPI) in June dipped from 2.6% to 2.3% YoY, below estimates of 2.5%. Excluding volatile items, PPI cooled from 3% to 2.6%, below forecasts of 2.7%.
Although factory inflation eased, the latest consumer inflation report in the US showed that prices jumped in June and are closing in on the 3% threshold, far from the Fedâ€™s 2% goal.
US Treasury yields dipped on Wednesday, with the US 10-year Treasury yield, which usually correlates negatively with Gold, falling three basis points (bps) to 4.459%.
Interest rate probability indicates that the Federal Reserve will maintain its current rates, with odds standing at 95% for a hold and 5% for a 25-basis-point rate cut at the July 30 meeting. Money markets had priced in less than 50 basis points (bps) of easing, with investors pricing in over 46 bps of rate cuts toward the end of the year.
US President Trump stated that another deal with India is forthcoming. He added that they would deal with Japan with the tariffs letter. He announced on Tuesday that the US reached an agreement with Indonesia, in which the latter will pay 19% tariffs, while US producers will pay 0%.
FXStreet calculates Gold prices in India by adapting international prices (USD/INR) to the local currency and measurement units. Prices are updated daily based on the market rates taken at the time of publication. Prices are just for reference and local rates could diverge slightly.
Gold has played a key role in humanâ€™s history as it has been widely used as a store of value and medium of exchange. Currently, apart from its shine and usage for jewelry, the precious metal is widely seen as a safe-haven asset, meaning that it is considered a good investment during turbulent times. Gold is also widely seen as a hedge against inflation and against depreciating currencies as it doesnâ€™t rely on any specific issuer or government.
Central banks are the biggest Gold holders. In their aim to support their currencies in turbulent times, central banks tend to diversify their reserves and buy Gold to improve the perceived strength of the economy and the currency. High Gold reserves can be a source of trust for a countryâ€™s solvency. Central banks added 1,136 tonnes of Gold worth around $70 billion to their reserves in 2022, according to data from the World Gold Council. This is the highest yearly purchase since records began. Central banks from emerging economies such as China, India and Turkey are quickly increasing their Gold reserves.
Gold has an inverse correlation with the US Dollar and US Treasuries, which are both major reserve and safe-haven assets. When the Dollar depreciates, Gold tends to rise, enabling investors and central banks to diversify their assets in turbulent times. Gold is also inversely correlated with risk assets. A rally in the stock market tends to weaken Gold price, while sell-offs in riskier markets tend to favor the precious metal.
The price can move due to a wide range of factors. Geopolitical instability or fears of a deep recession can quickly make Gold price escalate due to its safe-haven status. As a yield-less asset, Gold tends to rise with lower interest rates, while higher cost of money usually weighs down on the yellow metal. Still, most moves depend on how the US Dollar (USD) behaves as the asset is priced in dollars (XAU/USD). A strong Dollar tends to keep the price of Gold controlled, whereas a weaker Dollar is likely to push Gold prices up.
(An automation tool was used in creating this post.)

title: Thunder's Adam Flagler: Good to go Thursday - CBSSports.com
text:

Flagler hasn't played since Dec. 5 due to a right fourth finger metacarpal fracture but will be available Thursday. Flagler is unlikely to receive significant playing time, as he averaging just 3.6 minutes across 11 NBA appearances this season.

author: Manila Standard
title: First Couple to aid farmers, fishers in Negros Occidental and Antique next week
text:
Bacolod City â€” President Marcos will visit Negros Occidental and Antique on Thursday, June 27, 2024, to lead relief efforts for farmers and fisherfolk under the Presidential Assistance to Farmers and Fisherfolk (PAFF) program.
Mayor Alfredo Benitez confirmed the visit during a media briefing in Bacolod City, highlighting the preparations already underway by presidential personnel for the anticipated arrival of the Chief Executive.
The Presidentâ€™s visit aims to provide financial support to individuals facing economic hardships, with a special focus on the agricultural and fishing sectors.
President Marcos will personally oversee the distribution of cash assistance to around 10,000 beneficiaries in Negros Occidental. Out of these, 3,000 recipients are from Bacolod City, while each of the other districts in Negros will receive aid for 1,000 individuals.
Accompanying the President is First Lady Liza Marcos, who will lead a separate initiative called the â€œ Laboratoryo para sa lahat â€ (LAB for All) project.
This program is designed to offer essential laboratory and healthcare services to underprivileged individuals, who struggle to access government-provided healthcare.
The project, a collaboration among various government agencies, local government units, and the private sector, aims to serve a total of 1,500 beneficiaries.
Meanwhile, Antique Governor Rhodora Cadiao confirmed to Manila Standard that after the visit to Negros, President Marcos will proceed to Antique to distribute similar financial assistance to the community there.

author: Filippo Limoncelli
title: Che tempo farÃ  nel weekend? Forti piogge e nevicate, le Regioni coinvolte
text:
Una perturbazione in arrivo provocherÃ  forti piogge, nevicate e un generale peggioramento delle condizioni atmosferiche, coinvolgendo numerose regioni italiane. La causa di questo cambiamento repentino Ã¨ il transito di masse dâ€™aria fredda provenienti dal Nord Europa, che alimentano una vasta circolazione ciclonica nel Mediterraneo.
Attualmente, il vortice depressionario si trova sopra la Spagna e sta influenzando lâ€™Italia con piogge e temporali. Un secondo nucleo ciclonico si sta formando nei pressi delle Isole Baleari, diretto verso lâ€™Italia. I primi effetti si sono giÃ  fatti sentire il 12 dicembre, in particolare su Sardegna e Sicilia, e ora si avvicinano le regioni tirreniche e il Nordovest, soprattutto basso Piemonte e Liguria di Ponente.
Le previsioni per le prossime ore Nel corso delle prossime ore, la perturbazione proseguirÃ  il suo movimento verso est, estendendo il maltempo su gran parte del Paese. La mattinata di venerdÃ¬ 13 dicembre sarÃ  caratterizzata da nubi dense, piogge sparse e possibili temporali, che si sposteranno dalla Sardegna verso la Toscana, il Lazio, lâ€™Umbria e successivamente verso la Campania. Piogge persistenti si registreranno anche sulla Liguria di Ponente e sul basso Piemonte.
La fase di maltempo piÃ¹ marcata si registrerÃ  nel pomeriggio e in serata, con piogge diffuse al Centro, soprattutto su Lazio e Toscana. La serata porterÃ  un peggioramento anche al Nord, con fenomeni intensi nella Valle Padana centrale e orientale. Nel Sud, invece, il tempo resterÃ  asciutto, con condizioni piÃ¹ miti.
La perturbazione porterÃ  anche un ritorno della neve. Le precipitazioni nevose saranno piÃ¹ significative sulle zone montuose: sui rilievi del Nord, le nevicate saranno sporadiche, mentre sulla dorsale appenninica settentrionale e centrale, i fiocchi scenderanno giÃ  da 800/900 metri di quota, con accumuli fino a 1400/1500 metri nelle zone centrali.
Che tempo farÃ  nel weekend? Forti piogge e nevicate, le Regioni coinvolte (foto ANSA) â€“ Blitz quotidiano Che tempo farÃ  nel weekend Il maltempo si protrarrÃ  per gran parte del weekend, concentrandosi soprattutto sulle regioni tirreniche del Centro e parte del Sud, con piogge che potrebbero intensificarsi.
Il Dipartimento della Protezione Civile ha emesso un avviso di condizioni meteorologiche avverse . Per il 13 dicembre Ã¨ stata valutata unâ€™allerta gialla per il Lazio, la Campania, la Basilicata, la Sicilia e la Sardegna, a causa dei fenomeni meteo intensi previsti nelle prossime ore. Il vortice ciclonico che ha interessato lâ€™Italia nei giorni scorsi sta tornando, quindi Ã¨ necessario prestare attenzione.

author: RedacciÃ³n PolÃ­tica
title: â€œNo es mentiraâ€: Petro entrÃ³ a la polÃ©mica de la ministra de Trabajo y la empresa Van Campâ€™s | Noticias hoy | EL ESPECTADOR
text: A travÃ©s de su cuenta de X, el presidente Gustavo Petro compartiÃ³ varios mensajes sobre el choque que generÃ³ la ministra del Trabajo, Gloria InÃ©s RamÃ­rez, al seÃ±alar que la empresa de atÃºn Van Campâ€™s tendrÃ­a colaboradores bajo supuestas malas condiciones laborales. Luego de que la compaÃ±Ã­a seÃ±alara que eso no es cierto, Petro defendiÃ³ la postura de RamÃ­rez y dijo que â€œtienen trabajadoras tercerizadas desde hace 20 aÃ±osâ€. En uno de sus trinos compartiÃ³ una denuncia contra Seatech Internacional, fabricante de la marca Van Campâ€™s, en la que se habla de una â€œactitud fÃ©rreamente antisindicalâ€ de la empresa y de los supuestos contratos a travÃ©s de bolsas de empleo, con los que trabajarÃ­an miles de empleados por 15, 16 y hasta 20 aÃ±os. Lea tambiÃ©n: Tras orden de la ContralorÃ­a, Petro suspendiÃ³ al director de GestiÃ³n del Riesgo En otra publicaciÃ³n, el mandatario se refiriÃ³ al testimonio de dos empleadas que denunciaron maltratos como descuentos del salario por el tiempo que requieren para ir al baÃ±o. â€œMujeres trabajadoras y negras. Por eso las explotan, por eso no las escuchaban. Toda la fuerza del gobierno respaldÃ¡ndolas. Estamos con ustedesâ€, dijo. MÃ¡s temprano, el presidente ya habÃ­a compartido uno de los videos de las trabajadoras, en el cual una de ellas denuncia que la empresa las estÃ¡ â€œobligando a usar paÃ±os desechables porque nos descuentan del dÃ­a las idas al baÃ±o; eso no estÃ¡ produciendo, a futuro, enfermedadesâ€. No se pierda: Gobernador electo de Antioquia insiste en referendo de autonomÃ­a para departamentos SegÃºn la empresa productora de Van Campâ€™s, las declaraciones de la ministra no son ciertas y atentan contra los mÃ¡s de 35 aÃ±os de trayectoria de la compaÃ±Ã­a, por lo que se defenderÃ¡n en instancias legales. Sin embargo, el Ministerio del Trabajo asegura que ha hecho dos visitas a Seatech International Inc, en la sede de Cartagena, y que investiga 26 hallazgos por presuntas violaciones laborales. En un comunicado publicado este jueves, la cartera seÃ±ala que se investigan las querellas de las trabajadoras por un â€œdescuento ilegal en salarios por control del tiempo en las necesidades fisiolÃ³gicasâ€. AdemÃ¡s, explica que la compaÃ±Ã­a en cuestiÃ³n enfrenta 10 procesos activos, uno de ellos por presuntamente â€œrealizar retenciones o descuentos a los salarios de los trabajadores sin autorizaciÃ³nâ€. Por Ãºltimo, advierte que el ministerio adelantÃ³ ocho procesos sancionatorios que ascienden a mÃ¡s de $3.500 millones, tres directamente contra Seatech Internacional y los cinco restantes a la empresa temporal con la cual la compaÃ±Ã­a terceriza algunos servicios, Tiempo Servicios S.A.S. ðŸ‘â€ðŸ—¨ Conozca cÃ³mo votan los senadores y representantes a la CÃ¡mara en â€˜Congreso a la manoâ€™. ðŸ‘‰ Lea mÃ¡s sobre el Congreso, el gobierno Petro y otras noticias del mundo polÃ­tico.

author: Jorge Ãlvarez
title: Pedro SÃ¡nchez, sobre la ruptura de Vox y PP: 'Es un gran dÃ­a para EspaÃ±a'
text: Pedro SÃ¡nchez, sobre la ruptura de Vox y PP: "Es un gran dÃ­a para EspaÃ±a" El presidente del Gobierno, que asiste a la cumbre de la OTAN de Nueva York, espera ahora que el Partido Popular de FeijÃ³o rompa acuerdos en los ayuntamientos. El presidente del Gobierno, Pedro SÃ¡nchez, ha celebrado la [salida de Vox de los gobiernos autonÃ³micos en los que gobierna con el PP](https://www.huffingtonpost.es/politica/abascal-confirma-ruptura-todos-gobiernos-coalicion-pp-vox-pasara-oposicion.html) y en la rueda de prensa en la que pone fin a la agenda oficial de EspaÃ±a en la cumbre de la OTAN celebrada en Nueva York, le ha puesto deberes al lÃ­der de los populares, Alberto NÃºÃ±ez FeijÃ³o, al que le ha exigido ahora que dÃ© un paso mÃ¡s allÃ¡, rompiendo los pactos con la extrema derecha en los ayuntamientos y, ademÃ¡s, derogue [las "contrarreformas" aprobadas este Ãºltimo aÃ±o](https://www.huffingtonpost.es/politica/unno-gobiernos-pp-vox-factura-deja-memoria-democratica-igualdad.html) y se sume a la reforma de la Ley de ExtranjerÃ­a propuesta por su Ejecutivo. "Hoy es un gran dÃ­a para EspaÃ±a", ha afirmado Pedro SÃ¡nchez despuÃ©s de subrayar que el hecho de que Vox no vaya a estar en los gobiernos autonÃ³micos hace a "EspaÃ±a un paÃ­s mejor". El presidente del Gobierno, en todo caso, ha destacado que pese a que en los prÃ³ximos dÃ­as habrÃ¡ mucha "politiquerÃ­a" para interpretar quÃ© va a pasar despuÃ©s de este divorcio, los espaÃ±oles son los que van a salir beneficiados de esta separaciÃ³n polÃ­tica. "El responsable de meter a la ultraderecha en los gobiernos es uno, pero los beneficiarios de la salida de Vox de las Comunidades AutÃ³nomas somos todos. Especialmente todas", ha recalcado un sonriente Pedro SÃ¡nchez, quien ha sido incapaz de ocultar su "alegrÃ­a y felicidad" respecto a [una separaciÃ³n anunciada](https://www.huffingtonpost.es/politica/vox-advierte-entiende-pp-roto-acuedos-partidosbr.html) y que Santiago Abascal se ha encarado de consumar este jueves despuÃ©s de la convocatoria de una reuniÃ³n urgente y extraordinaria del ComitÃ© Ejecutivo Nacional del partido ultra. "La prueba del algodÃ³n para el PP" MÃ¡s allÃ¡ de la salida de Vox de los [gobiernos autonÃ³micos en los que gobernaba junto al Partido Popular](https://www.huffingtonpost.es/politica/los-gobiernos-autonomicos-pp-vox-todas-consejerias-controlan-abascal.html), una decisiÃ³n que toma el partido de Santiago Abascal y no el de NÃºÃ±ez FeijÃ³o, como ha destacado el presidente del Gobierno, Pedro SÃ¡nchez ha instado a que la direcciÃ³n del PP vaya mÃ¡s allÃ¡ y rompa tambiÃ©n con todos los acuerdos firmados con la formaciÃ³n ultra y le dÃ© la vuelta a todas las polÃ­ticas restrictivas aprobadas hasta hoy. Por ello, Pedro SÃ¡nchez exige al Partido Popular que acepte la propuesta de reforma de la Ley de ExtranjerÃ­a que ha rechazado al no haber tenido tiempo para su anÃ¡lisis y en la que se establecerÃ­a como obligatorio el reparto de los menores migrantes no acompaÃ±ados de las Islas Canarias, entre las comunidades autÃ³nomas de la PenÃ­nsula. "SerÃ­a la prueba del algodÃ³n de que el PP ha roto con las polÃ­ticas de Vox", ha indicado el presidente del Gobierno, quien ha seÃ±alado que es el momento de que el Partido Popular sea un partido de Estado y dÃ© soluciones a los problemas de los ciudadanos, vivan donde vivan. SegÃºn indica, serÃ­a "la prueba del algodÃ³n" de que el PP "ha roto con las polÃ­ticas de Vox", dado que esta crisis viene provocada por la negativa de esta formaciÃ³n a aceptar el reparto de menores migrantes. El presidente considera que ha quedado demostrado que la estrategia de "gobernar con la ultraderecha ha fracasado" y reitera que es una gran noticia para los espaÃ±oles, porque estos gobiernos han aprobado polÃ­ticas "ultraderechistas" en materias como violencia de gÃ©nero, memoria democrÃ¡tica, servicios sociales y calidad de servicios pÃºblicos, transiciÃ³n ecolÃ³gica y tambiÃ©n sobre cambio climÃ¡tico, segÃºn ha enumerado. Preguntado por la posibilidad de que el PSOE garantice la estabilidad de los gobiernos autonÃ³micos del PP de los que sale Vox, se ha limitado decir que en aquellos territorios donde el PSOE ejerza de oposiciÃ³n, seguirÃ¡ haciÃ©ndolo de forma constructiva. "Por tanto, dependerÃ¡ de las polÃ­ticas que proponga el Gobierno autonÃ³mico de turno a la Asamblea correspondiente el que cuente con el apoyo o no del Partido Socialista", ha aÃ±adido. El presidente del Gobierno cree que la estrategia de Alberto NÃºÃ±ez FeijÃ³o de gobernar con la ultraderecha, con la ruptura de PP y Vox, queda demostrado que "ha fracasado" y, tal y como ha reiterado, eso supone una gran noticia teniendo en cuenta todas las cosas que han aprobado esos gobiernos en materia de violencia de gÃ©nero, servicios sociales y calidad de servicios pÃºblicos, cambio climÃ¡tico y memoria democrÃ¡tica, como la [ley de Concordia aprobada este jueves en las Cortes valencianas](https://www.huffingtonpost.es/politica/pp-vox-derogan-ley-memoria-democratica-valenciana-iguala-democracia-franquismobr.html) antes del divorcio polÃ­tico.

author: James
title: After TikTok, Venezuela blocks VPN websites
text:
Venezuela has reportedly blocked more than twenty websites from some of the countryâ€™s top VPN providers.
These online restrictions came a day after President Maduro imposed a ban on TikTok for failing to appoint a local representative.
Indeed, people have turned to VPNs in droves as a means to continue accessing the video-sharing app. Proton VPN confirmed to Ny Breaking a 1,600% increase in signups across the country to date.
ðŸš¨EN DESARROLLO:Amanecieron bloqueados en Venezuela ðŸ›‘ With the 30 DNS pÃºblicos como 8.8.8.8ðŸ›‘ With the 20 sites web the VPNðŸ›‘ TikTokhttps://t.co/XDUUBHBwic #9Ene Esto has much more difficult information and estar communication, and other cases may result in a connection operationâ€¦ January 9, 2025
Today, January 9, 2024, Venezuelan digital rights group Ve Sin Filtro reports this that more than 20 VPN provider websites have also been blocked. These include Proton VPN, NordVPN, Surfshark, ExpressVPN and IPVanish.
A virtual private network (VPN) is security software that encrypts your Internet connections while spoofing your real IP address location. This last skill is exactly what is needed to circumvent restrictions such as those currently in place in Venezuela.
According to Ve Sin Filtro, Tor Browser and more than 30 DNS services are also restricted.
This is not the first time that the government has focused on circumventing tools to prevent citizens from circumventing online restrictions. In July, ahead of the presidential elections, citizens complained about problems using VPN apps.
At the time, Proton VPN suggested searching for applications directly through the AppStore or Google Play Store when using a mobile device. On the desktop you can download the VPN via the GitHub platform by clicking the â€œCodeâ€ button.
Ny Breaking has contacted some of the companies involved to confirm this, but at the time of writing we are still waiting for a response.
21 VPN providers affected This is the full list of the VPN websites that are restricted in Venezuela as we write this, according to data from Ve Sin Filtro:
Private Internet Access (PIA) is one of the big names not currently on this list. Jack Buckley, Privacy Advocate at PIA, confirmed to Ny Breaking that both the PIA VPN app and the providerâ€™s official website are working as usual.
He said: â€œEven though we are not directly affected by this issue and the data is still coming in, we are seeing the impact of Venezuelaâ€™s lockdown efforts. While full figures are not yet available, PIA is already seeing a 270% increase in website traffic from Venezuela at this early stage.â€
The TikTok ban remains in place The Ven Sin Filtro team also confirmed that the TikTok blocking continues in Venezuela at the time of writing.
Internet watchdog NetBlocks first reported the block will begin at midnight on January 8, 2025, â€œfollowing a pattern of daily multi-hour restrictions.â€
The blocking comes as the popular Chinese video-sharing app failed to meet the eight-day deadline set by the Venezuelan Supreme Court to appoint a local representative.
